basics.name: Aayush Fadia
basics.summary: Hi! I am Aayush, a Graduate Student pursuing a Master of Science - Robotic Systems Development (MRSD) in the Robotics Institute at Carnegie Mellon University.Previously I worked in the Qualcomm compilers team during 2022 - 2024 to accelerate on-device AI. I graduated with a Bachelors degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Visvesvaraya National Institute of Technology in 2022. While at VNIT, I interned at Google developing internal finance dashboards and a feature in the payments app GPay. In my free time, I like to read, run and lift.

highlights: Led exploration of emerging compiler technology to **accelerate on-device AI**.
Researched ML frameworks (like Pytorch, JAX, Mojo), intermediate representations, compiler optimizations and cutting-edge CPU vector instructions.
Identified common tasks/operations and designed compiler implementations to map onto fast hardware primitives.
Presented four **tech talks and produced technical documentation** to improve cross-functional team knowledge.
Set the stage for Qualcomm's foray into creating **developer-friendly ecosystems**.
**Learnings:** Machine Learning Internals, Vectorization, Working within Compute/Size/Power constraints

work.position: Associate Software Engineer (Windows on Arm Compiler)
highlights: Reverse-engineered and implemented compiler support for an undocumented Windows on ARM ABI.
Automated compiler artifact analysis to discover 13 and fix 5 critical compiler errors in **early** stages.
Developed a code-generator to **fuzz** compiler - identified and fixed three miscompilations.
Tested the implementation on several libraries and obtained **2x performance** of emulated code.
Analyzed assembly and wrote compiler optimizations to gain a **10% speedup** in a popular rendering benchmark.
Contributed to ongoing compiler stability by **root-causing and fixing performance regressions**.
**Learnings:** The Arm Architecture, High-Performance Coding, Build Systems
Implemented payment note suggestions in GPay, an app **used by millions** across India.
Contributed to **all stages of the lifecycle** - conception, development, testing, validation, deployment and evaluation.
Collaborated with multiple teams - product/project management, testing, data privacy and UX.
Decreased note-carrying transaction flow times by 50%.
**Learnings:** Large-Scale Engineering, Validating Critical Systems, Cross-Team collaboration
